attributes.action: ask that Automated Teller Machines ("ATMs") operated by UK banks should dispense £5 notes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current financial climate, people want to hold on to their money - especially young people. These days, if you need money quickly, you go to an ATM and select the smallest denomination possible, £10, despite only wanting to spend a few pounds. By dispensing £5 notes, this would reduce the amount of change carried by young people and therefore the amount they could lose if they were mugged. By dispensing £5 notes, banks would be encouraging responsible spending - by only giving out what people need.
attributes.creator_name: Cammy Easton, Fraser Hunter, Angus Duncan
